sentences.sContent: And if you sit even with the religious people and you ask them, would you let your daughter marry at the age of 12 or 13, they would tell you no.
sentences.sContent_eng: And if you sit even with the religious people and you ask them, would you let your daughter marry at the age of 12 or 13, they would tell you no.
sentences.sCn: 更何况，如果你和宗教人士坐在一起，询问他们是否愿意让自己的女儿在12或13岁时就出嫁，他们是定会说不愿意的。
